website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality wrench in a small package for those hard-to-reach spaces.
pros: Jaws hold tight and don't slip

customer_reviews.title: Buy the 8 inch instead
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THE 10 INCH UNLESS YOU ACTUALLY NEED A 10 INCH Great tool , tough as nails, easy to adjust, well built BUY THE 8 INCH FOR EVERYDAY OR EVEN EVERY JOB USE The ten inch is simply too big for the hand
customer_reviews.author: Nick W

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't really get any better than this
customer_reviews.text: If I was a plumber or a professional tradesman and I used this wrench everyday, I might have ponied up the extra cash and got the aluminum one. Or maybe not, It's only a 10" wrench and not all that heavy. But that's the only other option I would have considered, because the fact is you can't really find a better pipe wrench than these wrenches from Rigid. They're made in the USA and they're no more expensive than any other quality pipe wrench. Pretty much a no brainer, BUY this wrench if you need one, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Caribou60

customer_reviews.title: Just What I was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has a super solid build, was super easy to use, and got the job done! I was struggling to take the barrel nut off of my AR-15, and had all but given up when I decided to give this a go. Man, am I glad I did. It didn't slip, didnt strip the teeth on the nut, and didn't take another set of hands to make it work. I would recommend this product in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Rahz

customer_reviews.title: It is a Rigid, That is all you need to know
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid pipe wrench. It will last you a lifetime. It has a replaceable lower jaw, but you won't need it unless you are a professional plumber and us it every day for years. Great quality and made in the US. It isn't the least expensive, but you will never need another one.
customer_reviews.author: arcorabin

customer_reviews.title: If you can dodge a wrench, you can dodge a ball.
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I expected but that is probably on me for not truly considering the measurements. It will work perfectly for small household jobs. Very sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Made in U.S.A!
customer_reviews.text: This pipe wrench is built to handle all jobs around the house and garage! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: William J Bent

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for shower
customer_reviews.text: Was trying to replace the showerhead but the arm was stuck and I was worried I'd have to call a plumber. With this wrench it came off in about a minute and I was enjoying my new shower in no time. I haven't had it long enough to test the durability but the build seems fine for the price
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Jordan Newman

customer_reviews.title: The weight is a sign of reliability.
customer_reviews.text: Life time warranty you can't complain. The tool does seem a bit loose, but I've never used a pipe wrench that didn't jiggle around so I don't think it's due to faulty craftsmanship. The tool is hefty for sure, but it's made out of solid steel, so you can always use it to bang on stuff as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hann Qiu

customer_reviews.title: I Love it. . . .
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this product. As a proud union pipefitter, I've seen these wrenches on every job abused or not and still works. From the very smallest 10 inch to the largest 48 inch I've seen this pipe wrench from Ridgid is made in the U.S.A. enough said. Lifetime warranty!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two uses
customer_reviews.text: Broke while trying to undo a gass pipe. I usually expect more from Ridged.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes cost can't be the deciding factor!
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA! Had mine stolen, In a pinch I bought imported knock offs painted red and blue(teeth to soft, constantly adjusting, misaligned jaws, and bloodied knuckles) I bit the bullet and replaced my set...don't waste your money on the wannabees... just buy one Ridgid use it for a day you'll be back for the other sizes.
customer_reviews.author: h60gibs

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: it have a great bite ,and easy to clamp down , especially on small parts long handle to keep balance great tool
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Legendary
customer_reviews.text: Must have in every tool box. Will last a lifetime. American Made.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Passed the shawny test.
customer_reviews.text: Most pipe wrenches my brother managed to break. Rigid Pipe wrenches were the only pipe wrenches my brother could use without breaking the pipe wrench in the process. This is why I chose the rigid 10 inch pipe wrench over all other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Gobrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only pipe wrenches worth buying Got this for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ole Tom

customer_reviews.title: It's Rigid -- Well Worth It
customer_reviews.text: These guys make a great quality tool. No Harbor Freight shortcuts here. This is a good tool that will last!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur J. Gravel

customer_reviews.title: Ridgid is Quality
customer_reviews.text: Grips fantastic. My Lennox stuff was pure trash. Ridgid is the only way to go.
customer_reviews.author: BlackGun

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the product and highly recommend this seller to ...
customer_reviews.text: Wrench is as exactly as described and was received within the specified shipping time frame.Overall,I'm very happy with the product and highly recommend this seller to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: madmax3.6

customer_reviews.title: Working as intended. Couldn't get the job done with ...
customer_reviews.text: Working as intended. Couldn't get the job done with channel locks, the grip on this removed a shower head on a loose pipe with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Gauche

customer_reviews.title: Ridgid is as always as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you would espect from ridgid. A quality wrench.
customer_reviews.author: NLN

customer_reviews.title: Strong item ALWAYS RIGID ONLY
customer_reviews.text: heavy, sturdy as usual as Rigid is, there is a warranty also, they challenge you if handle broken a free one will be sent....wow this is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Hossam Jammal

customer_reviews.title: PIPEWRENCH ****
customer_reviews.text: This Ridgid 10" inch pipe wrench works great in our Pipefitter's tool boxes, being that it is made in the USA is a super plus.....Always shop for tools made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila P.

customer_reviews.title: Quailty ..
customer_reviews.text: If it says Rigid on it , its a keeper ..
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: There are pipe wrenches and then there are the best pipe wrenches and that is what Ridgid is. Best Pipe Wrenches
customer_reviews.author: B. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Now it's razor sharp and will easily cut my hand
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all. Used it just one time, dropped it from maybe 1 foot and the exterior paint coating chipped. Now it's razor sharp and will easily cut my hand. Worse of all this paint chipping occurred at the handle. So every time I go to use it I have to be careful not to get cut. So much for being American made. I expect better quality from a made in America product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: He is happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father. He is happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rica Del Mundo

customer_reviews.title: 10-inch pipe wrench is so versatile, you will wish ...
customer_reviews.text: 10-inch pipe wrench is so versatile, you will wish you had this on your tool belt. Rigid RKO’s the competition. Breaking their teeth out, while Rigid’s teeth will stay sharp and able to bite into thick wall pipe well into its 90’s.
customer_reviews.author: Zebrolova

product_meta.title: RIDGID 31010 Model 10 Heavy-Duty Straight Pipe Wrench, 10-inch Plumbing Wrench
product_meta.description:
Complies with federal specifications GGG-W65IE, Type all, Class A.

Offering professional-grade reliability, the RIDGID Heavy-Duty 31010 Model 10 Straight 10-Inch Pipe Wrench is a plumbing wrench that features ductile-iron housing and an I-beam handle for ultimate strength and long-lasting durability. It has a quickly adjustable full-floating forged hook jaw featuring self-cleaning threads and easily replaceable spring assembly, hook jaw and heel jaw.

With its versatile design, this straight pipe wrench is suitable for all forms of pipe work and comes in a convenient red color that is easy to locate in your toolbox. The 10-inch plumbing wrench is ideal for pipe diameters of 1/4 inch to 1 inch with a capacity of up to 1-1/2 inches.

RIDGID covers its products with a lifetime warranty against defects in material or workmanship for the life of the tool.

Since 1923, RIDGID has remained the symbol of certainty to dedicated professionals of the expert trades. Every tool that bears the RIDGID brand is engineered to the same high standards of quality, strength and endurance, as was that first heavy-duty pipe wrench more than 80 years ago.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Straight Handle Pipe Wrench. Sturdy housing and I-beam handle with full floating hook jaw, non-stick adjustment nut and replaceable hook and heel jaws. Rugged, easy-spin, nonstick adjustment nut that automatically cleans grime from hook jaw shank. Pipe capacity: 1-1/2 in. Weight: 1-3/4 lbs.
feature_bullets: Sturdy ductile-iron housing and I-beam handle for ultimate strength and durability
The full floating forged hook jaw allows for superior gripping and quick adjustments
Plumbing wrench features self-cleaning threads with easily replaceable hook jaw, heel jaw and spring assembly
Heavy-duty RIDGID pipe wrenches comply with federal specifications GGG-W65IE, Type all, Class A
10-inch (250 mm) pipe wrenches are ideal for pipe diameters of 1/4 inch (6 mm) to 1 inch (25 mm) with a pipe capacity of up to 1-1/2 inches (40 mm)
